subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic, the world’s third-ranked player, rallied to beat the unseeded Stanislas Wawrinka, 4-6, 6-3, 6-3, on Sunday at the Rome Masters.
snippet: Novak Djokovic, the world’s third-ranked player, rallied to beat the unseeded Stanislas Wawrinka, 4-6, 6-3, 6-3, on Sunday at the Rome Masters.
